description.raw:
1. Plugins are installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/lib/robocup3ds/
1. Models are installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/share/robocup3ds/models
1. Worlds are installed in  <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/share/robocup3ds/worlds
1. gazebo-robocup3ds is installed in /usr/bin
1. setup.sh is installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/share/robocup3ds

In order to use robocup3ds, you have to execute:

```
#!c++

gazebo-robocup3ds
```
description.html:
1. Plugins are installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/lib/robocup3ds/
  2. Models are installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/share/robocup3ds/models
  3. Worlds are installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/share/robocup3ds/worlds
  4. gazebo-robocup3ds is installed in /usr/bin
  5. setup.sh is installed in <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/share/robocup3ds

In order to use robocup3ds, you have to execute:

gazebo-robocup3ds
